title: Following Guidelines
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if Dallas can keep this series going with Golden State, injuries in the playoffs and the impact of NIL on college sports.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
